医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
Medline 将在 RYAN™ 分析仪上提供首个经 FDA 批准的床旁芬太尼尿液筛查套件Carolina Liquid Chemistries Corp. (CLC) 已与 Medline Industries, LP (Medline) 签订分销协议，为许多护理点场所提供首个经 FDA 批准的床旁芬太尼筛查测试套件和美国各地的临床实验室。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240801/Medline-to-offer-first-ever-FDA-cleared-point-of-care-Fentanyl-Urine-screening-kit-on-RYANe284a2-analyzer。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240801/Medline-to-offer-first-ever-FDA-cleared-point-of-care-Fentanyl-Urine-screening-kit-on-RYANe284a2-analyzer。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f4f7be96-c44e-4a9d-9180-130b5f8f2732 Thu, 01 Aug 2024 00:04:00 -0400 Medline to offer first ever FDA-cleared, point-of-care Fentanyl Urine screening kit on RYAN™ analyzer
仓鼠血清研究揭示了 Omicron 亚变体巨大的抗原多样性研究利用仓鼠血清绘制了 SARS-CoV-2 变体的抗原图谱，揭示了 Omicron 亚变体之间的实质性抗原变异，并强调了它们独特的免疫逃逸能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240801/Hamster-sera-study-reveals-Omicron-subvariants-vast-antigenic-diversity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240801/Hamster-sera-study-reveals-Omicron-subvariants-vast-antigenic-diversity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=37941faf-2ca2-4780-b5ef-177565444948 Thu, 01 Aug 2024 00:03:00 -0400 Hamster sera study reveals Omicron subvariants' vast antigenic diversity
研究发现，COVID-19 显着增加年轻人听力损失的风险患有 COVID-19 的年轻人面临听力损失和突发感音神经性听力损失的风险显着更高。研究人员敦促人们认识并进一步调查与 COVID-19 相关的听觉损伤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/COVID-19-significantly-increases-risk-of-hearing-loss-in-young-adults-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/COVID-19-significantly-increases-risk-of-hearing-loss-in-young-adults-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4b981b98-559d-4828-b10f-fca2e0be3ae6 Wed, 31 Jul 2024 23:39:00 -0400 COVID-19 significantly increases risk of hearing loss in young adults, study finds
AI将胶质母细胞瘤细胞重新编程为树突状细胞用于癌症免疫治疗在一项关于胶质母细胞瘤的创新研究中，科学家们使用人工智能（AI）对癌细胞进行重新编程，将其转化为树突状细胞（DC），树突状细胞可以识别癌细胞并指导其他免疫细胞杀死它们。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/AI-reprograms-glioblastoma-cells-into-dendritic-cells-for-cancer-immunotherapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/AI-reprograms-glioblastoma-cells-into-dendritic-cells-for-cancer-immunotherapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=80277932-27b5-455d-ac28-119fe6e4c3dd Wed, 31 Jul 2024 23:22:14 -0400 AI reprograms glioblastoma cells into dendritic cells for cancer immunotherapy
索尔克研究所获得 CIRM 资助，用于衰老和神经退行性疾病的干细胞研究索尔克研究所获得了加州再生医学研究所 (CIRM) 的 360 万美元资助，该研究所是世界上最大的致力于再生医学的机构之一。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Salk-Institute-receives-CIRM-funding-for-stem-cell-research-on-aging-and-neurodegenesis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Salk-Institute-receives-CIRM-funding-for-stem-cell-research-on-aging-and-neurodegenesis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0d71fc69-6722-4d74-9b9f-43fc68174524 Wed, 31 Jul 2024 23:16:36 -0400 Salk Institute receives CIRM funding for stem cell research on aging and neurodegeneration
食品中的碲污染物会增加高血压风险随着碲含量的增加，患高血压的可能性也会增加，碲是一种从采矿和制造活动转移到食品中的污染物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/High-blood-Pressure-risk-elevated-by-tellurium-contaminant-in-foods.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/High-blood-Pressure-risk-elevated-by-tellurium-contaminant-in-foods.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9cf1ee36-e2fe-45c2-8e82-fc88ea13d58d Wed, 31 Jul 2024 23:13:00 -0400 High blood pressure risk elevated by tellurium contaminant in foods
研究显示，因 COVID-19 导致关节置换手术损失了 9 个月布里斯托大学领导的一项新研究发现，自 COVID-19 大流行开始以来，关节置换手术已经损失了近 9 个月，减少了约 16 万例手术。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Nine-months-of-joint-replacement-surgery-lost-due-to-COVID-19-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Nine-months-of-joint-replacement-surgery-lost-due-to-COVID-19-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=86a5e808-0d74-4572-ac57-46b4cbe16b3d Wed, 31 Jul 2024 23:11:00 -0400 Nine months of joint replacement surgery lost due to COVID-19, study reveals
研究显示痴呆症风险降低干预措施可节省 ​​40 亿英镑伦敦大学学院研究人员领导的一项新研究发现，解决痴呆症风险因素的公共卫生干预措施可以通过降低痴呆症发病率并帮助人们活得更长久、更健康，为英格兰节省多达 40 亿英镑。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Study-reveals-c2a34bn- savings-pottial-from-dementia-risk-reduction-interventions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/Study-reveals-c2a34bn- savings-pottial-from-dementia-risk-reduction-interventions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e1c84687-79a5-4bcf-875f-142748fbfbf1 Wed, 31 Jul 2024 23:08:37 -0400 Study reveals £4bn savings potential from dementia risk reduction interventions
新的人工智能测试可以帮助肠癌患者避免不必要的化疗利兹大学领导的新研究表明，一种新的人工智能（AI）测试可以确定肠癌复发的风险，可以帮助患者避免化疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/New-AI-test-may-help-bowel-cancer-患者-avoid-unnecessary-chemotherapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/New-AI-test-may-help-bowel-cancer-患者-avoid-unnecessary-chemotherapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c01b6409-bc6a-4d04-8c72-55c46374cc74 Wed, 31 Jul 2024 23:04:25 -0400 New AI test may help bowel cancer patients avoid unnecessary chemotherapy
高舒张压与女性偏头痛风险增加有关根据美国医学杂志《Neurology》2024 年 7 月 31 日在线期刊上发表的一项新研究，患有高血压，特别是高舒张压，与女性参与者患偏头痛的几率稍高有关。神经病学研究院。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/High-diastolic-blood-Pressure-linked-to-increased-migraine-risk-in-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240731/High-diastolic-blood-Pressure-linked-to-increased-migraine-risk-in-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d1bcbcf4-8bb5-4920-9275-77c6dbca62a9 Wed, 31 Jul 2024 22:59:29 -0400 High diastolic blood pressure linked to increased migraine risk in women
